question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six monthssay how your work could be done while you are awayask for his/her help in arranging it,
text: I am writing this letter to express my interest in working at our head office location which is located in South Africa for around six months.  There is a strong reason behind this request as I have heard about the latest training which the client is serving, and I have decided to participate so that I can train other colleagues as well.

As far as I am concerned, I have completed most of my delicate tasks, however, a few of them is still pending which I have allotted to my team and they will do it accordingly. I have passed all the necessary information to them and will take the follow-up for the respective work.

I would be delighted if you can help me with some of the arrangements as you are my manager so I will be requiring approval on every matter. I have sent an email to your official email address wherein you need to give an acceptance and then our tourism department will arrange my travel.
I hope you will give your acceptance on it.
